00021 /* The pin_map.h file serves as a central pin mapping settings file for different processor
00022    types, i.e. AVR 328p or AVR Mega 2560. Grbl officially supports the Arduino Uno, but the
00023    other supplied pin mappings are supplied by users, so your results may vary. */
00024 
00025 #ifndef pin_map_h
00026  #define pin_map_h
00027 
00028 // IMPORTANT: Any changes here requires a full re-compiling of the source code to propagate them.
00029 
00030 #ifdef PIN_MAP_ARDUINO_MEGA_2560 // config.h
00031 
00032    // Serial port pins
00033    #define SERIAL_RX USART0_RX_vect
00034    #define SERIAL_UDRE USART0_UDRE_vect
00035 
00036 /// ==> NOTE: All step bit and direction pins must be on the same port <==
00037    #define STEPPING_DDR      DDRA
00038    #define STEPPING_PORT     PORTA
00039    #define STEPPING_PIN      PINA
00040    #define X_STEP_BIT 0  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 22
00041    #define Y_STEP_BIT 2  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 24
00042    #define Z_STEP_BIT 4  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 26
00043 /// 844 : T = A xor U
00044    #define T_STEP_BIT 6  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 28
00045    #define STEP_MASK ((1<<X_STEP_BIT)|(1<<Y_STEP_BIT)|(1<<Z_STEP_BIT)|(1<<T_STEP_BIT)) // All step bits
00046 /// <-
00047  /// Define step direction output pins. NOTE: All direction pins must be on the same port.
00048    #define DIRECTION_DDR      DDRA
00049    #define DIRECTION_PORT     PORTA
00050    #define DIRECTION_PIN      PINA
00051    #define X_DIRECTION_BIT 1  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 23
00052    #define Y_DIRECTION_BIT 3  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 25
00053    #define Z_DIRECTION_BIT 5  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 27
00054 /// 844
00055    #define T_DIRECTION_BIT 7  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 29
00056    // All direction bits
00057    #define DIRECTION_MASK ((1<<X_DIRECTION_BIT)|(1<<Y_DIRECTION_BIT)|(1<<Z_DIRECTION_BIT)|(1<<T_DIRECTION_BIT))
00058    // All stepping-related bits (step/direction)
00059    #define STEPPING_MASK (STEP_MASK | DIRECTION_MASK)
00060 
00061    // Define stepper driver enable/disable output pin.
00062    #define STEPPERS_DISABLE_DDR    DDRC
00063    #define STEPPERS_DISABLE_PORT   PORTC
00064    #define STEPPERS_DISABLE_BIT    7  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 30
00065    // STEPPERS_DISABLE_INVERT: Set to 0 for active high stepper disable or 1
00066    // for active low stepper disable.
00067    #define STEPPERS_DISABLE_INVERT 0
00068 
00069   // Limit switches are active low by default. If you have active high
00070   // limit switches, make sure to set the invert mask in the runtime
00071   // configuration.
00072    #define LIMIT_DDR     DDRC
00073    #define LIMIT_PORT    PORTC
00074    #define LIMIT_PIN     PINC
00075    #define LIMIT_PULLUP
00076    #define X_LIMIT_BIT   6  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 31
00077    #define Y_LIMIT_BIT   5  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 32
00078    #define Z_LIMIT_BIT   4  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 33
00079 /// 844
00080    #define T_LIMIT_BIT   3  // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 34
00081 /// 841
00082    #define LIMIT_MASK ((1<<X_LIMIT_BIT)|(1<<Y_LIMIT_BIT)|(1<<Z_LIMIT_BIT)|(1<<T_LIMIT_BIT)) // All limit bits
00083 
00084   /// from config.h
00085   // Comment or uncomment to determine which axes will be included in the homing
00086   // operation. Comment out any axes you don't have limit switches on.
00087   // not used ??
00088   #define HOME_X
00089   #define HOME_Y
00090   #define HOME_Z
00091   #define HOME_T
00092 
00093     // Define spindle enable and spindle direction output pins.
00094 /// 0.84 = 0.9d
00095  #define SPINDLE_ENABLE_DDR   DDRH
00096  #define SPINDLE_ENABLE_PORT  PORTH
00097  #define SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT   3 // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 6
00098 /// 841
00099  // SPINDLE_ENABLE_ACTIVE: Set to 0 for active low spindle enable or 1
00100  // for active high enable.
00101  #define SPINDLE_ENABLE_ACTIVE  0
00102  ///<---
00103   #define SPINDLE_DIRECTION_DDR   DDRE
00104   #define SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT  PORTE
00105 // 0.9d
00106 //  #define SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT   3 // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 5
00107  #define SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT 1  //  MEGA2560 Digital Pin 36
00108 /// 841
00109  // SPINDLE_DIRECTION_ACTIVE: Set to 0 for active low spindle direction or 1
00110  // for active high enable.
00111  #define SPINDLE_DIRECTION_ACTIVE  1
00112 ///<---
00113 
00114  // Define flood and mist coolant enable output pins.
00115  // NOTE: Uno analog pins 4 and 5 are reserved for an i2c interface, and may be installed at
00116  // a later date if flash and memory space allows.
00117   #define COOLANT_FLOOD_DDR  DDRC
00118   #define COOLANT_FLOOD_PORT  PORTC
00119   #define COOLANT_FLOOD_BIT 0 // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 37
00120 /// 841
00121  // COOLANT_FLOOD_ACTIVE: Set to 0 for active low flood enable or 1
00122  // for active high enable.
00123   #define COOLANT_FLOOD_ACTIVE  0
00124 ///<---
00125 
00126   #define ENABLE_M7 // ENABLED BY DEFAULT: Comment out to disable
00127   #ifdef ENABLE_M7
00128   #define COOLANT_MIST_DDR    DDRC
00129   #define COOLANT_MIST_PORT   PORTC
00130   #define COOLANT_MIST_BIT   2 // MEGA2560 Digital Pin 35
00131 /// 841
00132   // COOLANT_MIST_ACTIVE: Set to 0 for active low mist enable or 1
00133   // for active high enable.
00134   #define COOLANT_MIST_ACTIVE  0
00135  #endif
00136 /// <--
00137 
00138 /// TODO :to indroduire in 0.84x
00139 /*
00140 // 0.8c  not used here  !!
00141   // NOTE: All pinouts pins must be on the same port
00142   #define PINOUT_DDR       DDRK
00143   #define PINOUT_PIN       PINK
00144   #define PINOUT_PORT      PORTK
00145 // => TODO
00146   #define PIN_RESET        0  // MEGA2560 Analog Pin 8
00147   #define PIN_FEED_HOLD    1  // MEGA2560 Analog Pin 9
00148   #define PIN_CYCLE_START  2  // MEGA2560 Analog Pin 10
00149 
00150   #define PINOUT_INT       PCIE2  // Pin change interrupt enable pin
00151   #define PINOUT_INT_vect  PCINT2_vect
00152   #define PINOUT_PCMSK     PCMSK2 // Pin change interrupt register
00153   #define PINOUT_MASK ((1<<PIN_RESET)|(1<<PIN_FEED_HOLD)|(1<<PIN_CYCLE_START))
00154 // <=
00155 */
00156 
00157 #elif  PIN_MAP_CUSTOM_PROC
00158   // For a custom pin map or different processor, copy and paste one of the default pin map
00159   // settings above and modify it to your needs. Then, make sure the defined name is also
00160   // changed in the config.h file.
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 
00164 #endif  //pin_map_h
